Title: Surveying the Tower
Description:
Get a load of those rock formations! Surveying doesn't get much better than this.

This tower has been here for ages. The black dragonflight used it for some seriously dark stuff, but that's not why we're here. After the dragons left, a troupe of niffen bandits took shelter in the ruins and robbed the place blind. But they left a bunch of trash everywhere.

Imagine what we could learn about the niffen from that trash once we get digging!
ObjectivesText: Speak with Roska to start the dig, then excavate artifacts from around the tower.

Objectives.Text: Tell Roska to start the dig
